ACT2009::ModelPositions

ACT2009::ModelPositions Class Reference

This class is a container for a list of positions and its corresponding Model that shall be displayed. More...

Vector3 getPosition (int i)
 returns the specified position

Detailed Description

This class is a container for a list of positions and its corresponding Model that shall be displayed.
